snippet: Men's teams from Europe and the Rest of the World will begin a Ryder Cup-style competition in 2017 that will be named after Australian great Rod Laver, organizers said on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Men's teams from Europe and the Rest of the World will begin a Ryder Cup-style competition in 2017 that will be named after Australian great Rod Laver, organizers said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Ryder Cup-Style Competition Coming for Men's Tennis
headline.main: Ryder Cup-Style Competition Coming for Men's Tennis
